text: Stansted Hall, 2006 Stansted or Steanstead Hall was the country seat of the Earls of Essex during the reign of Henry VIII of England.p.44-45, Linda Porter, Katherine the Queen It is now owned by the Arthur Findlay College, a college of spiritualism and psychic sciences. ==References== ==External links== *The Arthur Findlay College Category:Tudor England Category:Houses in Essex Category:Houses completed in 1871 Category:Stansted Mountfitchet
title: Stansted Hall
